stimulusHtml: The nth derivative of a function f at x=0 is given by f n ( 0 )= ( −1 ) n n+1 ( n+2 ) 2 n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@495B@ for all n≥0 . Which of the following is the Maclaurin series for f ?
choicesHtml: − 1 2 + 1 3 x− 3 32 x 2 + 1 60 x 3 −⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A3B@

1 2 − 1 3 x+ 3 16 x 2 − 1 10 x 3 +⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@494B@

1 2 + 1 3 x+ 3 32 x 2 + 1 60 x 3 +⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4938@

1 2 − 1 3 x+ 3 32 x 2 − 1 60 x 3 +⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@494E@

1 2 −3x+ 32 3 x 2 −60 x 3 +⋯ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@473C@
